thread.title: Tech leaders make immigration a moral issue, not an economic one
thread.title_full: Tech leaders make immigration a moral issue, not an economic one - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joe Garofoli
title: Tech leaders make immigration a moral issue, not an economic one
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle LinkedIn executive chairman and co-founder Reid Hoffman speaks with CNBC's Julia Boorstin during a fireside chat at the Internet Association's Virtuous Circle conference in Menlo Park, Calif. on Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. LinkedIn executive chairman and co-founder Reid Hoffman speaks with...
LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman runs into a problem when he advocates for immigration reform in Washington.
